content.detailedDescription:
I was looking at the night sky outside my apartmen as i do every evening looking at the stars. as i turned to look towards the north east direction to see if i could spot the ursa major constellation, i noticed some lights moving in very fast from ne going towards sw.

i am used to looking at the night sky and can easily make out an aircraft with its blinking red blue and white lights or helicopters which are not uncommon over the city of bloomington on some nights. 

these three red lights, probably the sixe of a quarter (coin)were in a straight line and from where i was standing on the ground outside my apartment, appeared strung out with the distance between the first and the last light being about a yard. all three lights were circular and were dull red in color, and the edges of the lights were fuzzy as if the light was diffusing around them. i watched them come over to the spot where i was standing and there was no noise or sound of any kind. just as i turned towards south west to keep them in view, the light in the middle moved to a side, making the three lights appear in a triangular formation. the next second the light in the middle moved back into position in the straight line and the last one, the third from the front, moved a little to the right (the right of their flight path) and then moved back into a straight line position.

the absence of noise we associate with a flying object such as an aircraft or helicopter was spooky, and the lights disappeared into the haze of city lights.

the whole event lasted about 8 seconds. the lights moved really fast, as if they were gliding without any resitence and the absence of any noise was striking.

as soon as i lost sight of them i called my wife to tell her about the lights

i also tried to contact the bloomington herald times but their offices were closed and i was not sure if i could, or should contact the local airport to find out if they had any reports of the lights or similar lights from others or if their radar caught something.

there were three other reguloar aircraft in the sky at the time when i lost sight of the three red lights. the red lights moved towards sw and one aircract was moving from nw towards south and another in the opposite direction. there was also another aircraft moving on the north eastern horizon when i first saw the lights.

i am a trained journalist and i am absolutely certain that what i saw was not a conventional aircraft or a helicopter.
content.summary: Three red lights in a line that changed to a rough triangle and then to a straight line.

content.detailedDescription:
In san diego, califonia, new years eve. 
about 2 mins before the new year, i stepped outside onto my patio to smoke a cigarette, it was a very clear sky. and i was facing roughly west.  immediatly i noticed off to the west a very bright red ligh in the sky, so far away i thought maybe a satellite or a flare... it was that bright.. looked like the intensity of a red laser light. when i first saw it, i lined it up with the stars around it, so i could judge if it was moving.  didnt seem like it, for the first minute. then it started moving, barely noticeable. it took it about 10 mins, before it was to the left of me, and almost overhead. it was moving east south east, from my guess. i went outside in the parking lot so i could continue to track it.  there were about 5 other witnesses, the light would change intensity, rarely. when it was directly south of me, and right over this palm tree i was using to judge its movment, it stopped. stood there for probably a solid 5 mintutes.  then it totally dimmed and then disappeared.  ive looked online, i havent seen anyone mention it.. there had to be alot of eyes in the skies at midnight..

have you heard anything?? can you get back to me with links if you have.. 

i mean if it was a satellite it would be constantly moving, right?

curiously,

ralph dalessandro

ralphdalessandro@gmail.Com

any photo i would of taken would of looked like a laser light dot on the sky.  didnt bother with still photos.

by the way, i was totally sober
content.summary: Variable speed, variable brightness red light, so far, looked like a star/satellite.

content.detailedDescription: At midnight on new year's eve of 2008, we went outside our home in sunset, louisiana to see the local fireworks display.  as we looked to the southwest, we saw a cluster of 3-4 lights moving across the sky towards the northwest.  they looked more like planets than stars and were orangish-red in color.  following behind were 4 more single lights following as a tail.  they moved in a steady stream.  we knew they couldn't be airplanes because they didn't blink and they were too close together. we thought they could possibly be military helicopters but we couldn't hear any sound from them.  we were hoping they would travel directly over us so we could get a better sighting, but they were still at a distance.  we tried to take photos, but our camera couldn't zoom close enough to get a good picture due to the darkness and street lights.  never before had we seen anything quite like it, and we were excited to get a better look.  therefore we decided to get in the car and see if we could follow where the lights were headed, because we were losing sight of them due to the treeline.  we drove along the interstate where the horizon was most open for viewing, but we never saw the lights again.
content.summary: 8 objects moving as a group across sky.

content.detailedDescription:
We was in the rear of the house having dinner with some friends.
talking in the open facing the golf course, 3 red/orange lights on the west(everglades) at tree top level caught my attention. 
looks like they were rotating going up and down and some times disappearing to show up again in some kind of pattern. 
it's happened for a lapse of time of an hour and a half, always in the same spot of the sky.
then a plane show up from the south east (very fast) and i suppose it was a fighter searching something in the same location of the lights.
the plane made 2 or 3 laps and then disappear.
the sky was very clear and full of fireworks and planes, but those lights were very distinctive.
if somebody watched the same, please share.
happy new year!
content.summary: 3 strange lights on new years night, then a jet fighter show up.

content.detailedDescription: I went out on the patio for a smoke tonight.  i couldn't believe what i saw there was a bright white object over my head in the sky. it looked like a spinning star. so i had to go get out my night-vision goggles.  there were two shapes that were just spinning around each other real fast.  i couldn't make them out with all the colors from it.  it kept going but didn't move anywherer and i just sat there and smoked and watched it and i could not for the life of me figure out what i was seeing.  so then, all this color and light sparks starts shootimg off of it and the next thing i know the dam neighbors start shooting their guns at it.  it exploded in a rainbow burst of color that shot out all over the sky when i realized, oh my god it was midnight on new years.  the guns kept going off and people were yelling and i didn't know if they were yelling at the craft i saw or just because it was new years.  what a way to bring in the new year.  i'll never forget this new years as long as i live, and that's the god's honest truth.
content.summary: Saw a ufo people trying to shoot it down.

content.detailedDescription: I went outside at 5.30am to let the cat out and noticed 2 oval misty white lights in the sky to the west side of escanfraga mountain.At first the lights were very bright so i called my husband who stood watching with me.The cloud cover was high and thin and these lights were behind the clouds zig-zagging around together.They definately were not planes, we have an airport 45 minutes away, nor were they anything we have ever seen before.It was impossible to judge the hight as it was dark but they looked very big and changed direction in a flash.They looked like search-lights without the beam and not as bright,nor were there any other lights around them, just stars and the light cloud cover.We were amazed but thrilled as we are avid ufo believers and have seen several odd things in the sky here but never anything like this.We hope they were real and cant think of anything else they could have been.We eventually went up to our roof terrace and watched from there for another 15 minutes or so.The lights seemed to be playing with eatch other moving together then apart and becoming a single one at times.They started to fade and eventually after observing them for a good hour they disappeared.I took some photos and have something on one of them but cant be sure whether i have captured a photo of something and what i have is not a star as these can be seen in the photo. we are definately going to watch for them again tomorrow morning at the same time and will get in touch with you if we see anything.I hope this information is useful to you. barbara
content.summary: 2 glowing dics shaped lights randomly flying together over my house.

content.detailedDescription:
Looking to the west of my location i noticed 4 objects apear over the crest of a hill. they apeared one at a time at 7 minute intervals heading in an easterly direction.
each object came to a halt and then changed direction 90 degrees clockwise (from a westerly heading to a southerly heading). as each object aproached this point in the sky, it also stopped and changed direction 90 degrees. each object then proceeded to slowly move in a southerly direction towards the station in kallhall. when it was still above the skyline, it seemed to disapear. the 3 following objects then did exactly the same when they got to this point.

each object was identical and had a red glow with a slight yellow/orange tint. the light it was emitting was a static soft glow, it did not flash, pulse, or seem to increace/decrease in brightness. from my vantage point each object looked about the same size as a 6 wheel lorry, but was spherical or eggshaped. i could not see any outline of the object as the light that was emitted was a soft glow.

over the 30 minute duration of my seeing these objects in the sky, their speed changed vastly from very slow to extremly fast. i could not hear any noise coming from the direction of the object.
content.summary: 4 objects above stockholm move in identical pattern 7 minues apart including a 90 degree turn.

content.detailedDescription:
driving to work one day during the morning, in sacramento,
from watt ave entering highway 50-east.
   my exit was sunrise blvd in rancho cordova, about 15 minutes before i got off the freeway.    then i began to notice a steel colored object i assumed to be a old world war 2 bomber that are a common sight when the air shows from the nearby military base occur.
    the distant object went from the left side of the freeway, gradually to the right over a 5 minute period.    driving down a semi empty patch of freeway the object came closer, the bright morning sun on the steel glowed off the top making it hard to see.
    after the object moved to the right side of the freeway, a jet came from behind my car, it was impossible to miss from the square intakes to the wings that stood out distinctively that could fold back.
    the cockpit of the jet faced left in a hard turn as it crossed the middle of the freeway, the jet rotated it's orientation facing to the right
dragging it's own weight to counter act the first turn.
 in half the turn towards the object as it came close began to change from even flight and started to react as the top of the craft bent in the direction of the jet.
   after the jet "buzzed" the object closest, it veered in the opposite direction left, revealing the underside to have a receded  dark ring and a center that was not sunk inward.
  the climax that followed after i was shocked from the first pass followed as the jet made another pass in the same direction, the difference was the object was off to the right more.  as the f-14 approached the object, it was swaying side to side as a response to the object's movement, left to right four or five times. at the last moment something happened, the craft began to disappear from bottom to top, time stood still to me as a witness.

-i would describe this as transparency, as the craft began to disappear from bottom to top as the darkest regions went first to the upper top right as the brightest as all was seen last as a brilliant refection off a steel hull from the sun that was reduced to a speck in moments.

-craft was larger than the perusing jet by about 1/3 or more.

   after the object disappeared, the jet veered off to the right of the freeway, i assumed it went to the air force base near by in ranch cordova again.

could not see any windows in the craft due to the sun's reflection, had a shiny steel look to most of the craft except one circular part underneath it.

i leave 3 pictures of best i can describe the scene from art to the best 3d i can produce.

please feel free to contact me in the evenings after 5pm i should be there,
i always pick up on the message machine. call me any time!
content.summary: Depiction f-14 chases ufo after 5 minutes of watching, ufo goes transparent during second jet pass

content.detailedDescription: I was turning down my road coming home from new years at a friend's. as i stared down the road, i noticed a red dot in the sky, and thinking its just an airplane i drove on. unknown to me, the trees had blocked my view of 2 other red lights of the same shape. i immediately came to a stop to watch to look for movement as these were too close for any aircraft formation at night. i raced into my driveway and called for my mom and dad to come out to look at these as well. as i ran back out the door, i saw another appear out of the southeast sky and slowly move towards the other objects. they seemed to be just below the clouds and stayed there for quite some time. the three objects to the left/southeast were in a diagonal arc formation and seemed to move perfectly in sync with each other. the other light seemed to move more freely. there was never a sound or a hint of any engines with these. the lights also never changed from a bright red almost flare like glow, and occasional flicker. as we watched, a neighbor came out to go to his car. i called him over to look at the objects as well, and being stunned, he ran back in to get anyone he could to come outside as well. we stood and watched these object slowly drift southward. they seemed to descend for a short time before finally disappearing completely. only one seemed to disappear into the clouds, but glimpses were caught coming in and out of the clouds. i stood in amazement and shock and only managed to get a short video of the closest object on a small digital camera. i waited about thirty minutes before calling local police dispatches but none had any reports.
content.summary: 4 red lights to the south/southwest sky seen by me/my father/ and my neighbors at 12:38 jan.1, 2009.

content.detailedDescription:
Monday march 24, 2008 at approx. 5:10pm i was driving home from work.  i was working on fort rucker, al and living in the country near the town of ozark. i was driving through a school zone so i was going about 20 or 25 miles per hour. suddenly i noticed something very unsually in the sky just above the trees, which were on a hill directly in front of me. at first i thought to my self, i never seen a big blimp or ballon around here before, but as i got closer i realized it didn't look like any blimp i had ever seen.  the street is straight so i continued to drive towards the object in the sky.  there was no other traffic so i slowed down even more.  the sun was shinning on the object from behind me and there were no clouds in the sky.  i could see the blue sky all around the object with no sign of anything going down to the ground.  i guess it should be called dics shaped, but i prefer to let a drawing of it speak for it's self.  it was a solid light gray or sliver with some of the area on the left side appearing almost white. it appeared to be a design kind of like we see on us army uniforms or maybe it was some kind of symbles, but only on the left side. the bottom was flat, the left and right sides were rounded, and the center was higher than the sides.  it was as large as about 2 or 3 average houses in this area.  i didn't see any windows or lights on it.  my car windows were up and the radio was on so i couldn't here it even if it was making a sound.  it was hovering in one place with no movement visible.

as i was getting nearer to the object there was a lady walking on the left side of the street going in the same direction as me, i looked at her to see if she seen the object.  she was looking down at the ground as she walked so i doubt she seen it.  

at the end of the street was a stop sign and then the next street would continue in the same general direction but it would be going down and up rather steep hills and curve left and right.  while i still had the object in sight i had to make a decision.  should i pull over and stop by the side of the street and wait to see what the object would do or should i try to get a closer look?  the lady was behind me and had already made a left turn on another street so i didn't have time to ask for her help.  i choose to get a closer look.  i drove forward and when i went down the first hill the object went out of my view because trees raised up in front of it.  as i came up the next hill i kept looking left and right but i never seen the object again.  i kept looking the rest of the way home incase i misjudged it's distance from me and incase it moved. 

when i got home i told my wife what i seen and then we drove back to the street where i seen it but it was gone.  i few days later i took my digital camera with me to work and on my way home stopped a few places on the street to make pictures of the area the object was hovering above.  after enlarging the pictures on my computer i believe i know which trees, building and tall power pole it was hovering above. next my wife and i drove on all the side streets looking for the building and pole.  we believe we finally found the area on a dirt road with no name that leads to a power sub-station.  i believe the ufo was hovering directly above the sub-station.  we drove to the sub-station and then turned around.  right next to the sub-station is a mobile home with people living in it.  it would have been under the ufo also. i believe the sub-station is only about 1/4 mile from where i could see the ufo, so it was even closer than that since the street went down and then up a hill. as we drove past the trailer a man came out on the front porch staring at us, but i was afraid to stop because we were probably trespassing on his land and how do you start a conversation with a total stranger about a ufo above his house?  the dirt road is a dead end with only one trailer on it and the sub-station.  i often wonder if the people living there seen or heard anything.

i have lived and worked in this area since 1989 and i have never seen anything that looked like that object in the air or on the ground. some people are probably wondering did i really see it or was i mistaken.  well, that would be like asking someone, can you really see that house or can you really see that building in broad daylight with the sun shinning on it.  yes, i really seen it. i know ufos exist, but i don't know what they are, where they come from, or what they are doing here.

attached is a picture of the area i seen the ufo.  the ufo was slightly above the trees with the sky visible under it.  it was so wide that the trees on the left side and right side of the street almost blocked some of my view and i guess it was about 2 stories high.
content.summary: Ufo hovering in daytime.

content.detailedDescription: I was attempting to get to sleep, i was looking at the sky and i saw a orange light slowly drifting from east to west, i dismissed it as just the rotation of the earth, but now i realize that the other stars were not moving close to as fast as it was moving. i saw and heard nothing as it was very far away, i've seen one of these things every night since then, it seems to be regular. it has moved closer and farther very slowly, it has moved up and down as well at 1-5 mph, it was too far away to see such details as fine shape other than from my vantage point in my 2nd story room. there seems to be something that it watches 30-50 miles in that direction, possibly the doylestown airport. but i'm not familiar to that area. or maybe the air force base a bit farther. each time i saw the object i eventually stop watching, but it tends to take around 30-45 minutes to move across the window. but it seems to move reguarly.
content.summary: Orange light slowly drifting from east to west.

content.detailedDescription: I have vidio that you would not believe,but i am afraid that if i post it thr government will take it and maybe take me. what sould i do?
content.summary: Slow moving no sound.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving on belfast road at around 8 o'clock at night on 12/31/2008.  i noticed a very bright light travelling west to east and it was very close to the tree line.  at first i thought it was an airplane but the light was so bright and solid, not flashing like an airplane does.  because i am a little bit of a nerd i stopped my car and rolled down the window and i couldnt hear any engine noise.  at that point i started to think that it was something more than an airplane.  i started driving again when the light changed directions and started heading south. . . almost where i was. i got very nervous about what this light was and decided to hightail it to my boyfriends house. when i got to his house which is less than a 1/4 mile from where i saw the light it was nowhere in the sky. very strange. . .
content.summary: I was driving and saw a very bright light in the sky but it was very close to the tree line, no noise, just a bright light. changed directions and so did i!

content.detailedDescription:
I saw your show on discovery today. this happened two years ago and this is the first time i am reporting it. my story is not as amazing as the story i saw today, but i did see a ufo and had two other people with me when i saw it. 

i was at home.

a light hung in the sky for a long period of time. then began to move closer.

the object was a diamond shape with red and white lights. it moved "floated" across my back yard with no sound. the object was aprox. 10 to 15 foot in lenght. the object came within 100 foot of me.

i was excited. i kept asking my brother if he sees it.

we followed "ran" after the obect for three blocks and we lost sight of the object. when we, my brother and i, came back to the house we were still looking toward the sky talking about what we just saw. we then saw a red streak go across the sky and it was gone.


if you would like more information please feel free to call me. i did see this object. it's funny, i find myself looking at the night sky differently now then i did before this event.

thank you for your time.
content.summary: I saw a diamond shape object flying "floating" in the air.

content.detailedDescription:
It is the last day of the year, the time is 0:15.

as i'm sitting inside watching the fireworks outside i see to my left in the sky a red spherical object moving slowly upwards in an arch.

as i see it i thought it was a flare or some kind of projectile, but as i keep watching the thing keeps moving upwards slowly. it did not slow down or speed up. it did not have smoke behind it. it did not flicker.

as i keep watching it it moves higher and to the north slowly (eventually disappearing from sight).

then i watch again to the left and i see another one coming and going the same way.

and one more. this one had the same distance to the second one as the second one had to the first.

when i realised the first one wasn't fireworks i started to run for my camera, but the crappy thing was completely unable to make a decent night time photograph.

my small binoculars also were unable to discern specifics.

all three of these objects traversed half of the visible sky.

about 15 minutes later another one (or one of the same) comes this time from the north west side going straight and when about in one line with me goes north again.

at this point the sky becomes so filled with smoke from all the fireworks the objects become harder to see when they are far away.

at 0:45 again i was able to spot one coming and going the same way followed by another a few minutes after.

over the next 30 minutes i saw about five more. some coming from the west others from north-west. two of them were going almost side by side.

interestingly i had the idea before the sighting what this party would look like from the sky and how possible observers would experience it.



the first picture shows two coming up from the west, but unfortunately i moved my hand.

the second shows one going up coming from the west.
content.summary: At least three red sphere like objects moving slowly through the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I went out on my patio for a smoke at about 1730 hrs. patio in on south side of my house in the st. mary woods section of libertyville township.Temperature was about 20 f. night was clear. moon was partial and easily seen. it looked like the triangular formation i had seen this past october at an azimuth of 170, elev 30. i observed the formation for about 10 minutes and asked my wife to come out to look at the formation. she came out after putting on her coat. i pointed out to her where to look. she saw nothing unusual about a " large " star.It's now 1800. i'm going out again to see if it's still there. i don't drink and don't discount any other reports on this phenomenon even though iit's new year's eve. it's still up there. a commercial flight passed under and to the south of the formation ( probably from o'hare.) the formation was triangular with not less than three bright lights . altitude of the formation could not be determined distance from the observer could not be determined.No sound or other anamoly was noted. size of the formation could not be accurately estimated.It was not a weather balloon, lenticular cloud formation, migrating bird group,sunset reflection, or any other bs explanation. i am a retired us army artillery officer and a graduate architect. my location is 1 mile west of i-94 and 1000 ft south of il rte 176
content.summary: Fixed triangular light formation. no apparent movement. azimuth of 205. elev. 25. seen longer than 20 mins.

content.detailedDescription: Have 4 small video on an object,  taken on a sony 8mm camera ,you be the judge.....  need to put it in a cd .
content.summary: Have video of object flying around all the time.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on my back porch at approximately 1:45 pm on dec. 31, 2008.I observed two large objects in the sky moving from north to south very slowly.  at first i thought they were two aircraft but while watching them they stopped for approximately ten seconds and didn't move.  one of the objects appeared to be a little larger than the other one. the objects appeared to be disc shaped and were very bright , don't know if it was a reflection from the sun or if it was the color.  these objects came from over the top of my house and then out into the open.  they appeared to be maybe six or seven thousand feet up , they were very big.After they had sat there for about ten seconds, the larger one started to move south very slowly then after moving maybe a quarter of a mile, it zipped away unbleievably fast toward the south.  there was no sound that i could hear. it was gone in the matter of a second.  the other shape moved the same direction as the first for about the same distance and then zipped to the west, southwest at the same incredible speed.

i grabbed the phone to call my brother who lives in the next county up to tell him what i had seen. i was on the phone approximately one minute with him.  after hanging the phone up i sat there for another minute and looked back up into the sky and there were two smaller starlike abjects in the same spot as the others.  they were very bright and shiny and a lot smaller than the other two objects were.  they sat there for about ten to fifteen seconds and then zipped away to the west, southwest.  they didn't really move they zipped, i don't know how else to describe how quickly they moved. there is nothing i know of on this earth that can move that quickly with no sound at all.  that is the last i saw of them.I did not have time to get video of this event.

thank you for listening
content.summary: There were two disc shaped , bright, objects that appeared in the sky.  they hovered for a bit and one zipped off to the south and the other went west.  there were two smaller ones that appeared in the same spot and then went west.

content.detailedDescription:
We were driving from san francisco, ca to sacramento, ca along the i-80 e, as we were passing the i-680 interchange entering fairfield, ca my husband robert asked me to look at the approaching lights. he asked "what kind of plane is that?" i looked up and noticed three large, dark red circular lights pulsating in a line, one would light and fade, then the next would light and fade and then the last would light and fade.  the lighting and fading of the red lights was slow and steady, but definitely in a continual linear pattern. visible as well was one large dark green circle that was lit steadily.

i said "it's just a plane", but he insisted, saying he thought it was something else, as it did not have the typical white strobes and wingtip lights common on aircraft.  i continued to look as he he drove, the craft was coming directly toward us, and would pass overhead shortly.

i looked up through the moonroof to see it pass directly overhead.  i was amazed to see it was actually a dark grey scalene triangle shaped craft, with not only the the pulsing red and steady green lights, but with three more of the same pulsing red lights along the tail end of the triangle. i told my husband it was definitely not a plane-it was a triangle. it was passing approximately 500' above the freeway, and was approximately 400' long, approximately 150' wide at the wider end of the triangle.  i approximate the size, but in looking through the moonroof (large size on as in an suv) once we were directly under it, the triangle was fully visible through the moonroof and took up the entire view.

i continued to watch it, but in a few seconds, it seemed to disappear, and we couldn't catch sight of it through the rear view or side view mirrors in the car. we definitely felt after seeing it that we'd seen an unidentified craft of some sort, that it was definitely not a plane.  a very cool experience indeed!

as a note: robert's dad was in the us air force and he grew up on air bases all over the world, and has not seen an aircraft ever with those light characteristics.  robert was also in the navy and stationed on an aircraft carrier, so he is familiar with planes and their silhouettes-both commercial and military.
i am a trained scientist, with much experience technically/scientifically describing and "de-bunking" things in the name of "science".  i have technical and mathematical expertise-i was skeptical about it initially but changed my mind quickly, as my eyes told me i had to believe what was right in front of them.  we felt so strongly about this experience, we had to report it to mufon.  thanks for all you do, keep up the good work.  information is power!  we also created and have a rendered drawing of what we saw we could upload and share.
content.summary: A scalene triangular shape, with steady dark green and pulsating dark red lights.

content.detailedDescription: I dont know why you people waste your time investigating lyers.  give me a polygraph if you look you will see i have posted a detailed description of the event and i dont mind telling you about it again.  the time it happend is approximate.  but i saw it big and colorful and plain as day creaping up on my neihbors house i said oh [pd] then it shot a bluish beem out of it that went through my neigbors house(trailor)  and his house didnt even cast a shadow the light went through it.  then it slowely scanned 45 degrees to its left until it hit my face, then all i remember is waking up on the floor paralysed .  give me a polygraph and i swear i will pass with flying colors.  i will get perfect score with no deception i have no reason to lie it would be embarrasing to get caught and im not worried about that.  i will pass.
content.summary: I was asleep on my front room floor when i woke and looked out my living room window there it was.

content.detailedDescription:
This event happened around 25 years ago. i've told friends and family but they remain skeptical at best. first, let me say non of the people involved are reliable witnesses. why? we were 18 years old and a little bit drunk after a night of dancing at the disco (el coqui) of the cerromar beach hotel. also, we saw no ufo, just the aliens. the reason i'm telling this story is because i watched the show on the discovery channel about chris bledsoe and for the first time somebody has described the aliens exactly as we remember them.

for what is worth, this is my story. my best friend and i had been drinking at the disco of the cerromar beach hotel until close time (4am). instead of going directly to our car, we decided to walk around the grounds of the resort and wait until we were in better shape to drive. not even 10 minutes after, we were walking down a slope and suddenly, out of the bushes (40 to 50 feet in front of us), came two figures right into our path. 

these figures were of normal height but dressed, from head to toe, in what seemed to be a silver suit out of a sci-fi movie from the 50's. "that is one of the multiple reasons our story is so hard to believe." except for the red eyes (which i don't particularly remember) and the height, they were exactly the same as the image of the alien rendered in the discovery show.

my friend and i looked at each other to make sure we were both seeing the same apparition and then looked back at the "aliens". finally, we looked back at each other and my friend, in drunken stupor yelled - "aliens, lets kill them!". yes, it wasn't the most friendly of greetings but to our limited defense, we were two drunken 18 year olds graduating from a military academy during the 80's, which wasn't one of the most peaceful times in our history. 

after screaming our welcoming statement, we went on pursuit of the aliens to perform the first interplanetary lynching by an ignorant and drunken mob. i guess they were as perplexed as we were since they just looked at us and didn't move until we were about 10 feet (more or less) from them. suddenly, they reacted and started running. they took off trough the same bushes they came with us right behind. at this time, i was on the lead about 5 feet from the last individual. i could almost grab him with my arm. in fact, that is exactly what i was trying to do.

after coming out of the bushes on the other side, they made a left. on the other side of the bushes there was an open field with at least a 50 meter clearing. me and my friend still right behind, lost the figures from view for no more than 1 second. after coming to the other side the aliens where gone. 

there is no way in hell you could suddenly loose somebody running that close. but when we entered that field, they had just disappeared. we looked around but found no trace of them. and we had been left with a mystery in our hands. up to this day, my friend doesn't discuss the event with anybody for fear of being ridiculed, i don't blame him. he even gets exasperated when i bring it up. i guess i was exited when i watch the show and finally saw somebody that had seen the same aliens we saw and not the "normal" gray ones with big heads and big black eyes aliens.

something about missing time, we finally got to our car about 6 - 6:30am (daytime). i have no idea if we really missed and hour or two, or simply got distracted given the events. but when we encountered the aliens it was night and when we arrived at the car it was day. something else, don't ask me why (because i don't know), but i'm sure they were aliens.

i know this story don't amount to much, but i wanted to thank chris bledsoe for coming forward with his story. i know it has helped me, or at least made me feel less crazy.
content.summary: Brief contact with 2 aliens.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving west with my mother on highway 465, approximately five miles northwest of branson, mo.  nearest intersection:  hwy 465 and hwy 76.  i glanced towards the northwest at a 45 degree angle and noticed an object suddenly appearing. i didn't think it could be an airplane because it just suddenly was there, with a clear sky.  it was highly reflective and traveling from the northeast to southwest.  i would estimate it being 2000 feet up and disc shaped-thirty-five to forty feet in diameter.  i watched it for ten seconds before it became darker and began "peeling" layers off it's outer rim counterclockwise.  looked like three feet was systematically being stripped away.  this happened for five seconds before it, growing smaller, disappeared completely. i still wonder if this behavior was a "cloaking", or if the object was folding in upon itself.  for three weeks afterward i experience "distorted" time.  that is, one week felt like five!  highway 465 is seldom used and was nearly vacant when we where traveling on it that thursday afternoon.  this is not the first sighting around branson area i've had.  three weeks later, after slowly recovering from my time distortion, i read about the stephenville, texas sighting, also on october 23, and i wonder if what i saw, somehow related?
content.summary: Disc moved from n.E. to s.W. changed color and shape became smaller then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: In sept 06 myself my wife and son ware in our pool we saw two ojects with lights,one of the ojects came closeer we had a abovegound pool a ladder 5 feet hi' so i stood on the ladder to see better aspaceship came in close 100feet above it had a black botom slver top ,it came closeer i became afraid .And got off the ladder it went away ,backed up and lift .I think they were curious because i am black and my wife is white our son is mixed
content.summary: In backyard pool saw lights.

content.detailedDescription:
The first night my mom was letting our dogs out the back door looking towards our horses when she saw a pulsing and color changing light in the nw sky towards phoenix, just above our tree.  she thought it was a very close plane, but then noticed it never moved.  after getting out the binoculars and looking closer she saw a second one in the same area.  i came over and looked at them through the binoculars and could see red, white or blue, green and yellow lights pulsing and changing on the first one.  i tried to take a picture with my digital camera and nothing came out,though i could see it on the screen.  we watched for  20 minutes or so and then stopped and got ready for bed. we were stumped as to what it could be.   about 10 minutes later my mom checked the back door making sure it was locked and they were gone.  

the next night about 7:30 pm we looked to see if we could see them again and saw the same thing but higher.  again we looked at it through binoculars and could just see changing lights in a circular shape, but i noticed the red lights seemed to move around the circle of color changing light that was white, blue and yellow.  but the binoculars are not great so the object was blurry.  my mom started looking in the sky further and saw a total of 6.  i looked at them too, the other 5 were smaller and located around the night sky.  the first one was in the same area only higher.  my husband, who is a truck driver, was 100+ miles to the north and west saw the bigger one and saw the color changing.  we were on the phone for about 5 minutes looking at it and trying to figure out what it was.  the time we were looking at it and discussing it seemed to take half an hour, but it was only a few minutes.  again we were stumped as to what they were.
i suppose it could have been satellites, but i never noticed anything like them before out here.  i have seen lights that seem to pulse or blink, but not like this.  i looked in the news reports and there was nothing reported about them.
content.summary: Multiple pulsing color changing lights around sky.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
In the spring of 1994, my husband and children and i were on our way home from an evening church service.  it was just about dusk and the sky was cloudy with a spritzing of rain.  the temperature was in the upper 60's or low 70's. we were dropping off a church visitor who lived in a small town in maryland which very closely borders our own home in harrington, de. we were on knife box road on the maryland side near several power lines and a power staion.  we witnessed a fleet of ufo's flying in and out of the clouds.  they appeared to be flying in an orderly fashion with one group flying towards another group and back and forth.  they were irridescent in colors of green, yellow, and maybe white.  motion within motion comes to mind when i do my best to recall how i could describe how they moved.  they glided through the sky at speeds that is not possible for man made vessels.  we were instantly fearful of being noticed or followed and what ultimately happened next in our lives substantiated our fears.  the next three months of our lives presented us with paranormal encounters that would send most into a mental breakdown and maybe even death.  being grounded in faith we survived.  at least physically.  however, the havoc it played on our family ultimately contributed to our demise as a family unit.

today, i am a private investigator.  investigating and recording the facts is my profession.  to pretend i am an expert and authority on the subject of ufo's and abductions would be a huge error of arrogance.  but to deny that the information we have to contribute is insignificant would be an even greater mistake.  so few are willing to admit to these strange happenings, but being grounded in faith, and blessed with an intense love for truth, makes me an excellent candidate for having suffered these encounters for the purpose of informing others.

as a result of these encounters, i am writing a book titled, "divide and conquer."  those who have encountered and studied these phenomonon know there is "nothing new under the sun."  but with careful examination of the evidence of many, we can become wise to the world we are living in and our eyes may be enlightened to the oppositions that are among us.
content.summary: My husband and i witnessed a fleet of disc shaped ufos on knife box road on the maryland side near denton, md. they appeared to be flying in formation. they appeared to be motion within motion and were very clearly iluminated with flourescent lights.

content.detailedDescription:
On october 24th, 2008, at about 7:40am, my father and i were driving westbound on the long island expressway on our way to work.  we were in the queens, ny area of the expressway.  at this time, the sun was already out, and the sky was completely viewable.  we were at about exit 19, which is the queens blvd. exit.  airplanes typically travel above this area, sometimes fairly low to the ground, since both la guardia airport and kennedy airport are located near by.  

i looked up into the air in front of our car and remember seeing a dark-gray (almost black), chrome looking object/craft no more than 40-50 stories in the air.  it was hovering mid-air, very slowly traveling east as we were traveling west.  it was also simultaneously rotating slowly as it floated.  we were probably going about 30-40mph, so we were going towards the object relatively quickly.  the only way for me to describe its shape is that it sort of looked like a 3-dimensional "m".  the object had very pointy features, and had 2 or 3 legs that protruded downward from what i can remember.  i realized that it was not a plane and asked my father, "what is that?"  he too, looked up, slowing down the car a little bit so he could get a good view.  he didn't know what the object was either.  by the time 30 seconds had passed, our car had already passed under the object, and it was behind us.  it still remained in the sky, and i watched it for as long as a i could through our car's sun roof.  

i did not have a chance to capture a picture of the object (not even with my cell phone) which is something i deeply regret.  however, we did notice other drivers breaking in front of us as well, so i only hope that others witnessed this same object.  i have attached a 2-dimensional sketch of what the object looked like.  once again, it occurred on october 24th, 2008, at about 7:40am, in queens, new york.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: My father and i saw a ufo hovering in mid-air while driving on the long island expressway at 7:40am, on 10/24/08, in queens, ny.

content.detailedDescription: Around 10 p.M. on a windy, cloudy and rainy night i was letting my two dogs out for the night before going to bed. normally, i let them out and wait for them to come back in but it was somewhat warm for november and i was standing in my driveway waiting for them just looking up into the sky. it was windy but not raining at the time and the clouds were racing across the sky. i was looking up in the sky to my southeast when an object appeared after a cloud had raced by. my first thought was that it was a strobe light that a car dealership uses sometimes for a promotion, they do use these in my town and i have seen them in the sky before. the object was round and had horizontal split / seperation across the middle. the split wasn't real wide but it was noticable. as the object appeared from the cloud racing by it was stationary at first and then moved slightly as if hesistating then it moved steadily down slightly to my right. it dissappeared from my sight before the houses in front of me would have obscured my view. i am up on a hill so i have a decent view of the sky. the reason i am ruling out a car dealership strobe light is becasue a strobe light tends to move left and right across the sky and is somewhat bright. this was what made this object strange to me. i said it hesitated at first then move forward and arced downward - not side to side like a strobe light. the other feature of this object was the way it glowed. it had the glow of a garage door light. it reminded me of the glow my garage door light gives off with the cover over the light bulb, not bright and somewhat dull. the seperation across the middle was unique as well. after i realized this was not a strobe light i felt a fear run through my body and especially into my stomach. i continued to look into the sky for another few minutes but i did not see anything more. it is difficult to describe the size of this object and how far up it was in the sky. after thinking about it for a while and using a plane as a comparison i would have to say it was the size of four airplanes but round. i went in the house and told my wife and daughter and they could tell i wasn't kidding. my daughter and i tend to hold similiar views on this type of thing and she asked a few questions and that was the end of it. i have never seen a ufo before, i have always wanted too. to me, this was a ufo.
content.summary: Round dull lighted object with a split/separation horzontally across the middle.

content.detailedDescription:
This happened sept- dec of 1983 or 84, i was living in labelle, fl at the time, and i have never told anyone about this before----i was in my back yard at night observing the night sky ( i like astronomy--therefore, with my education in it, i knew they were not stars or planets) listening to the high school band playing at a football game.  a v-shaped fleet of saucers ( two rows on each side of the v) flew over my head  they were moving quite fast, and in a straight line-----there was no sound---nothing, but they were glowing.   the v shape was then followed by two smaller round balls of light about 2-to-3 seconds after the main formation came over.  total sighting was probably 1-1 1/2 minutes. i am a firm believer in other forms of intelligent life in the universe, and when i saw this fleet, it was amazing! i thought to myself, come back! don't go!---that was when the two smaller spheres zipped by. i followed them by sight as long as i could until they disappeared out of range.

i'm pretty sure of the months and years because my father passed away in 1983, and my mother and i moved into another residence soon afterwards, the dates, i'm not sure of----i know it was getting chilly out, so our winter weather in fl was just starting to show up. my boyfriend played in the high school band, and i was waiting for him to come over after the game.

i never did a follow-up about the sighting, or anything else, because i figured people would think i was crazy. i would love to know if anyone else saw this that night.
content.summary: Fleet of saucers came over my house.

content.detailedDescription: In the middle of november of 2008 at approximately noon, i was walking on a country road near my residence when i observed a rectangular, silver craft the size of a single-engine cessna flying west to east at an altitude of less than 500 feet. it moved slowly, not maneuvering, and at first i thought it was a small private jet. then i observed that the craft had no contrail behind it and made no noise whatsoever. i watched the craft for ten minutes until it flew out of my range of vision. this is the third time a ufo has flown at low altitude within a quarter of a mile of my residence.
content.summary: Flat rectangular silver craft.

content.detailedDescription:
December 29
it was around 10:10 at night and i was coming home from working the night shift.  as i got out of my suv i looked up in the sky and saw a brillant white light craft.  it was spinning in the sky and would go up and down.  as it went faster and faster, i noticed there were waves in the sky moving away from it and the sky looked like the rainbow effect you see when gas hits a rain puddle.  it was unbelievablie beautiful.

i watched it for quite some time and could see little blue sparks and gold flecks of light coming out.  then it appeared to explode into color and vanish.  i was completely shocked by what i saw and had to just sit there for a few minutes and catch my breath.

the next thing i knew, it appeared again.  my dog chief started barking because he was freaked out.  this time it looked the same, but after a while, it seemed to change appearance and grow and it looked like a giant rainbow light jellyfish in the sky.  it was so pretty.  after i watched it for a long time, it finally vanished again.  i don't know what that was that i saw, but it wasn't anything i'd ever seen in my life.
content.summary: Starlike ufo over my house.
